Posts.Content: Hello Zanib  So sorry to hear that. I know how sad you can feel right now. I have similarities with. I have 5 years old son and I also feel for him I have to fight.I had recurrence within 6th months of my treatment finished but I am ok now Alhamdulillah.  Keep faith on Allah and be positive.  If you would like to chat with me let me know.  Best wishes  Monira
Posts.Title: Hello everyone.

Posts.Content: Walaikumasalam Zanib, Yes i can understand what you are going through.Have they given you any treatment plan yet? I will get my end of year ct scan result on 2nd January so i am also very scared.Treatments are very advanced now so I hope and pray that they will find out a way.Try to spend more time with your son.You have to be strong for him.
Posts.Title: Hello everyone.
